title: The Adventure of Little Ralph JAP PSX2PSP
description:
Chippoke Ralph no Daibouken:
The Adventure of Little Ralph (PlayStation)

Developer: New Corporation
Released: June 3, 1999
Current value: $100 - 150  (Your best bet to is to purchase on Japanese PSN store.)
Fan translation: None, but no Japanese necessary.
Only fast dialogs are in Japanese, menu and such are in English.

Tested and working on 6.60 PRO-C (Model: 04G) (PSP-3004)

HOW TO USE:
Unrar and Copy map thats looks somting like this: 'SCUS94227' 
the copy that folder directly into the Ã¢â‚¬Å“PSP/GAMEÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ directory of your memory stick.
Now you can see game in game list, and enjoy playing it

ABOUT:
Har to find information, but its one of the best 2D-platformer games ever, it's looks easy, but is hard. The Adventure of Little Ralph nails everything. Awesome music and perfect controls. Just beat the game, with this release, and i'm thrilled to play it again. There is so much things to explore.
BEST OF ALL, YOU DONT NEED TO UNDERSTAND JAPANESE AT ALL!

One man said:
One of the greatest slept on platformers for the PS1
The Adventure of Little Ralph is pretty damn great & rare. It's got that old school challenge, but it's fair for the most part. Excellent music, multiple ways to go through the levels, & some of the boss fights play out like a pretty good 2D fighting game. My advice is for everyone to play the game on easy first though.
